name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#** and **SQL**, with a solid background in **AWS** and **Azure DevOps**, specifically in setting up **Pipelines** and implementing **RBAC** and **SSO** strategies for secure identity management. Strong expertise in cloud solutions, having deployed scalable applications in **AWS** and **Azure** environments.
Experienced in Agile methodologies and DevOps practices, fostering collaboration and efficiency within teams. Highly skilled in developing applications with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and employing frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, along with **Django** for robust backend solutions. Knowledgeable in ensuring compliance with **OWASP** standards while maintaining software quality.
Additionally, I have built and integrated AI/ML functionalities within applications to enhance predictive analytics and real-time capabilities, leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps practices.
